name: Path Creation
description:
*Before game will take commands, the white border right next to the game screen must be clicked by the mouse*

Players have an inventory of bombs, walls, and pathways.  They can create and destroy to their choosing, enjoying the rich colorful explosions when bombs are set off. Additionally, players can choose to create custom mazes for their friends to attempt to complete. The arrow keys or W,A,S,D move your avatar. Click on inventory items with the mouse to select them and then click within the bounds of the game to use the inventory items.
